diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $RT$ is $2x+7$ units.
The length of the line $RS$ is $3x-5$ units.
The length of the line $ST$ is $22$ units.
The length of the line $RT$ is equal to the length of the line $RS$.
line_instances: There are lines $RS$, $RT$, and $ST$, forming the triangle $RST$.
